---
title: 'Pagination'
slug: 'react/components/pagination'
implementationOf: 'Pagination'
---

## Standard

```jsx
<Pagination
  numberOfPages={10}
  hrefBuilder={(page) => `#/Components/Pagination?page=${page}`}
  onPageChange={(page, e) => {
    e.preventDefault()
    console.log('Navigate To Page: ', page)
  }}
/>
```

## Total Number of Pages Unknown

```jsx
<Pagination
  hrefBuilder={(page) => `#/Components/Pagination?page=${page}`}
  onPageChange={(page, e) => {
    e.preventDefault()
    console.log('Navigate To Page: ', page)
  }}
/>
```

## Many Pages

```jsx
<Pagination
  numberOfPages={100}
  forcePage={16}
  hrefBuilder={(page) => `#/Components/Pagination?page=${page}`}
/>
```
